title: When my friends come over to play league
body:
They're all like
https://lovelace-media.imgix.net/uploads/602/c57f1260-fdea-0132-4535-0a2ca390b447.gif?w=740&h=370&fit=max&auto=format

and im just like
https://media.giphy.com/media/wYyTHMm50f4Dm/giphy.gif

and they're like
https://media.tenor.com/images/71b172b045c011116ec0958b19cc6c03/tenor.gif

and then im like

replies.body: Why do your friends come over to play League? Isn't that like your friends coming over to talk on the phone?
Obviously each friend is assigned a single letter on the keyboard (Q, W, E... etc.).
Drink frequency based on cd?
Pick Karthus. The friend you like is given R. The friend you hate is given Q
*****meanwhile in ~~URF~~ ARURF*****

"Ok guys, drink every time you press your button"
_picks ARURF_

_Mad cackling at the sealed fate of the friends_
THe E guy drowns and the w guy is sober as can be
acct sharing. u trying to git me banned?
Congratulations, you passed the test...

Things would get really difficult with one person controlling the mouse, and two more for left and right clicks.
{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}
LOL
but then how else is the orgy supposed to happen ?
ASMR orgy?

- To chill in between games
- Because it's nicer to talk to eachother in real life rather than through a microphone
- When your PCs are next to eachother, you can see eachothers' screen. It's easier to give advice this way. My friends are almost all silver/bronze so they could use a lot of it.
- You can see eachothers' accounts, easier to give/get feedback on rune pages, etc.
- Some people can't play as well at their own home due to parents or bad connection.

> Because it's nicer to talk to eachother in real life rather than through a microphone

Yeah it's easier to tell someone to %%% by just screaming it at them through one room than writing it in chat, can confirm. Me and my friends always meet to play League together for our daily dose of flame.
Well, I don't have any friends. Problem solved.
But I hate talking on the phone...
I've had to institute an "ARAMS only after 11:00" rule after a couple disastrous (and salty) flex queue experiences...

I plead... NOT GUILTY

... I mean, I had fun ;)
That is a good rule.
I find it highly disturbing your friends turn you into a gecko just because you refuse them alcohol.
Hey! geckos are cool! they do... Things...
ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ You just made my day!

(Assuming you are also of age (assuming they are of age))
That's when, in order to not make yourself depressed as fuck with all the losses, you must drink as well, even if you don't like the taste/burning sensation.
If you lose in this game and have to drink to get over it you have a big problem...

> [{quoted}](name=iamthegoatofwar,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=u2T3b6gT,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-09-28T23:13:49.019+0000)
>
> If you lose in this game and have to drink to get over it you have a big problem...

So you never drink beers with your friends? That's kind of sad, you should try it.
Did I say drinking with your friends is wrong? no. I said if you lose and have to drink to get over it you have a problem. Do you understand my point now?
